text: Jiří Nigrin (Černý) z Černého Mostu, since about 1590 titled z Nigropontu (died 1606) was an important printer in Prague between 1572 and 1606. Among other works, Nigrin published many of the compositions of renaissance composer Jacobus Gallus. == Literature == * Kašparová, Jaroslava: Španělské tisky 16. století z dílny pražského tiskaře Jiřího Nigrina ==External links== * https://web.archive.org/web/20061009202642/http://www.pribramska.cz/knih/semprace/utrhacu.html Category:1606 deaths Category:People from Prague Category:16th-century printers Category:17th-century printers Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Date of death unknown Category:17th-century Bohemian people
title: Jiří Nigrin
